text: COTS index dealers get shorter - market longer. $ SPX $ NDX $ DJI $ RUT pic.twitter.com/yGYsOYZsNg

My personal hunch is that the $ DJI has topped now. The $ NDX could make a new high, but if you assume markets tend to move together, it's entirely possible the $ NDX has topped as well. We won't probably know until early August after the Fed meeting.
